solution.text:
Height of pipe,h \(=_{j}_\)cm
Diameter of pipe,d \(=_{k}_\)cm\(\Rightarrow\)Radius,r\(=_{{k/Decimal(2)}}_\)cm
Margin to be given for folding at the top and bottom\(=_{l}_\)cm
Total margin\(=_{l}_ \times 2 = _{{2*l}}_\)cm
No. of pipes to be covered,n\(=_{m}_\)
Cost of vinyl sheet\(=\)Rs.\(_{n}_\) per sq.cm.
Quantity of vinyl sheet required to cover a single pipe\(=2\pi r(h + \,total\,margin)\)
\(=2\pi \times _{{k/Decimal(2)}}_ \times (_{j}_+_{{2*l}}_)\)
\(=_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(2*l))),3)}}_cm^2\)
Quantity of vinyl sheet required for \(_{m}_\) pipes\(=_{{trunc((2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(2*l))),3)}}_ \times _{m}_\)
\(=_{{trunc((m*2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(2*l))),3)}}_cm^2\)
Therefore, cost of vinyl sheet for covering all pipes\(=_{{trunc((m*2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(2*l))),3)}}_ \times _{n}_\)
\(=\)Rs.\(_{{trunc((n*m*2*pi_val*(k/Decimal(2))*(j+(2*l))),3)}}_\)

content.text: A cylindrical pipe of height \(_{j}_\)cm and diameter \(_{k}_\)cm is to be covered with a layer of vinyl sheet on the outside. A margin of \(_{l}_\)cm is to be given for folding at the top and the bottom. What is the cost of vinyl sheet required for covering \(_{m}_\) such pipes at Rs.\(_{n}_\) per sq.cm.
